oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Framed pictures and documents of U.C.V. General Julius Franklin Howell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Framed pictures and supporting documents of Julius Franklin Howell, who was a general in the United Confederate Veterans organization. During the war he was a corporal in Company K, 24th Virginia Cavalry. Two of the documents are dated September 9, 1943, and the photographs and the other items are undated.
